issue.title: [CF 1157] tracking enemy targets shroud
issue.body:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SUnit^Sparty~`1-4 ^SType^Scleu ^SShowTimerText^B ^SCLEUDur^N15 ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_AURA_APPLIED_DOSE^B ^SSPELL_AURA_APPLIED^B ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^SGUID^STMW:icon:1Lyp2P7bQLAC ^SName^S115834 ^SDestUnit^Sarena1 ^SCLEUNoRefresh^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SBUFFNUMBER ^SOperator^S> ^SUnit^Sarena1 ^SName^S115834 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSourceFlags^N4294967247 ^t^N73501^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Entering arena, enemy rogue uses Shroud of Concealment.
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Creat an Icon/Timer on enemy target buffed with Shroud of Concealment (not the rogue using it that's already in stealth)that will drop off when said shroud is removed and/or refresh for the remaining duration if it's reapplied.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v7.3.5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No error is triggered.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I've tried many many different methods to get this icon to appear and track the enemy targets shroud, many different modifications but everything I try doesn't seem to work, it will work on allies, but for obvious reasons it can continue to track.

This is the string I use to track Shroud of Concealment on a non-rogue target that is an ally.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scleu ^SShowTimerText^B ^SCLEUDur^N15 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SBUFFNUMBER ^SOperator^S> ^SName^SShroud~`of~`Concealment ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_CAST_SUCCESS^B ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SUnit^Sparty~`1-4 ^SName^SShroud~`of~`Concealment ^SEnabled^B ^SSourceFlags^N4294967199 ^t^N73501^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Ayiu | Imported from CurseForge issue #1157 | Raw

comments.body:
This particular event is specifically blocked by Blizzard from the combat log to prevent abuse.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I don't want to track the rogue using Shroud of Concealment, I want to track the buff that happens on the opposing player with shroud of concealment.

If an aura event is created, it'll show where the source of Shroud came from, and who it was applied to.

if not auralogger then auralogger=CreateFrame("Frame")

end;auralogger:RegisterEvent

("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED");auralogger:SetScript

("OnEvent",function

(_,_,timestamp,event,_,sourceGUID,sourceName,sourceFlags,sourceR

aidFlags,destGUID,destName,destFlags,destRaidFlags,spellID,spell

Name)if string.find(event,"AURA") then print(event..": aura:

\""..tostring(spellName).."\"; source: \""..tostring

(sourceName).."\"; destination: \""..tostring(destName).."\"")

end end)

Will show both from the stealth target and the destination target. I just specifically want an icon to show on the target that was buffed with Shroud, not the target that created it.

e.g. rogue(arena1) uses shroud while stealth, shaman(arena2)receives visible buff(Shroud of Concealment)for a split second before entering stealth, I just want an icon that stays there and continues to count down from 15s, and will go away if the shaman comes out and enters combat. ONLY on the shaman, not the rogue that is still in stealth.

Edited Sep 14, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Ayiu

@Cybeloras: Go

I don't want to track the rogue using Shroud of Concealment, I want to track the buff that happens on the opposing player with shroud of concealment.

If an aura event is created, it'll show where the source of Shroud came from, and who it was applied to.

if not auralogger then auralogger=CreateFrame("Frame")

end;auralogger:RegisterEvent

("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED");auralogger:SetScript

("OnEvent",function

(_,_,timestamp,event,_,sourceGUID,sourceName,sourceFlags,sourceR

aidFlags,destGUID,destName,destFlags,destRaidFlags,spellID,spell

Name)if string.find(event,"AURA") then print(event..": aura:

\""..tostring(spellName).."\"; source: \""..tostring

(sourceName).."\"; destination: \""..tostring(destName).."\"")

end end)

Will show both from the stealth target and the destination target. I just specifically want an icon to show on the target that was buffed with Shroud, not the target that created it.

e.g. rogue(arena1) uses shroud while stealth, shaman(arena2)receives visible buff(Shroud of Concealment)for a split second before entering stealth, I just want an icon that stays there and continues to count down from 15s, and will go away if the shaman comes out and enters combat. ONLY on the shaman, not the rogue that is still in stealth.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ayiu

If there are different spellIDs, then you can use those to distinguish between the effects, but otherwise, there isn't any way to distinguish between the two that I am aware of.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
